Content: Ven. Diyasenpura Wimala Thero, the resident monk at ‘Bavunseth Mind Relaxing Meditation Center’ at Helummahara, Dekatana trained one more Officer and fifty-six Other Ranks of the Sri Lanka Army for meditation  on Friday (8) at the invitation of the Directorate of Psychological Operations at the Army Headquarters. This is an ongoing project, meant to raise mental relaxation and tranquility in mind.
